location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint plan based on a provisional survey carried out on 22 July 1934 enclosed to a copy of a ‘Report on areas acquired in Bahrein’ by Major K.M. Papworth (folio 187).Shows the extent of the land designated for the Naval Base situated at Ras Al Jufair about 3 miles south of Manamah. Dimensions reported.Characteristics including information on marking, surface and present occupation described in ‘Appendix D’ (folio 194).
